pr_title: SONARJAVA-3561 AbstractRegexCheck should target more regex providers

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3561 AbstractRegexCheck should target more regex providers
SONARJAVA-3561 AbstractRegexCheck should target more regex providers

timeline.bodyText: I'd argue that we don't want to ignore annotations here: If a regex in an annotation defines a named group that's not used by a backreference, the named group is pointless and we should report it. That said, this rule is completely reworked in SONARJAVA-3567, so there's no point in changing anything here - I'll take care of it on my side.
timeline.author: sebastian-hungerecker-sonarsource
